functions.name: proxy_kubeconfig_file_permissions
functions.description: Checks permissions of kube-proxy kubeconfig file.

functions.name: kube_proxy_kubeconfig_file_ownership
functions.description: Checks ownership of kube-proxy kubeconfig file.

functions.name: kube_proxy_metrics_bind_to_localhost
functions.description: Checks if kube-proxy metrics are bound to localhost.

notes: All functions are based on Kubernetes KUBE-PROXY API.
Ensure proper RBAC permissions are configured.
KUBE-PROXY is a Kubernetes network proxy component.
Configuration, security, monitoring, network, and compliance are key aspects.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Kubernetes client libraries for API interactions.
